sentences.sContent: I fell down the steps and sprained my ankle .
sentences.sCn: 我从台阶上摔下来，扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.sContent: Rubin suffered a right ankle sprain when she rolled over on her ankle.
sentences.sCn: 鲁宾摔倒时身体压到了脚踝上导致右脚踝扭伤。

trans.tranOther: to damage a joint in your body by suddenly twisting it
A sprain is the injury caused by spraining a joint
